name: My Own Enemy
description:
Avoid an enemy you control in a simple platformer. 

ALPHA - Made for a three hour game jam. I planned on a longer level and a little narration about being your own worst enemy but, you know, three hours.

Controls

Left / Right - A / D or Left Arrow / Right Arrow

Jump - W, Space or Up Arrow 

Art assets from https://www.kenney.nl/

Sounds effects from https://mixkit.co/

Music from https://www.facebook.com/freegamemusic/
